## pairsToMap() function

Turns a list of name-value pairs into a map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function pairsToMap<TVal>(pairs: Array<NameValuePair<TVal>>): Map<string, TVal>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pairs | Array&lt;NameValuePair&lt;TVal&gt;&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
